Coding Assistant

Powerful Features for Modern Development

Everything you need for autonomous AI-assisted coding, from context management to test integration.

Smart Context Management

Automatically loads related files, imports, tests, and configs for intelligent coding decisions.

Advanced File Editing

Multiple edit methods: search/replace, line-range edits, and automatic backups with revert capability.

Test Integration

Auto-detect and run tests with Vitest, Jest, pytest, or Go test. Ensures all tests pass.

Git Awareness

Check status, create checkpoints, focus on changed files, and revert changes safely.

MCP Integration

Connect to external MCP servers for extended capabilities like file systems, GitHub, databases.

Plugin System

Extend functionality with custom tools and domain-specific logic through a powerful plugin API.

Safety Controls

Dry-run mode, risk assessment, and command blocking for dangerous operations.

Autonomous Loop

AI iteratively works on tasks until completion with loop detection and max iteration limits.

Cross-Platform

Works identically on Windows, macOS, and Linux with automatic command adaptation.

Beautiful TUI

Real-time progress tracking, colored output, and clear visualization of all operations.

Enhanced Reasoning

Advanced problem-solving, pattern recognition, and systematic error handling.

Production Ready

Battle-tested with comprehensive error handling, automatic backups, and revert capabilities.
